about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Marc Philippe GNANCADJA, a data engineer and analyst with a passion for turning data into actionable insights.
about.bio1: I was born in Cotonou, Benin, and developed an early interest in computers that grew into a passion during high school. After studying Computer Science Engineering at university in Tunisia, I discovered my calling in the data industry.
about.bio2: Currently, I help businesses around the world by building robust data pipelines, analyzing complex datasets, and creating data-driven solutions that drive decision-making.
about.bio3: Right now I'm based in France, Ile-de-France region.

pipeline.title: Data Pipeline Development
pipeline.description: Design and build scalable ETL/ELT pipelines to process large volumes of data efficiently and reliably.

analysis.title: Data Analysis & Insights
analysis.description: Transform raw data into actionable insights using statistical analysis and data mining techniques.

visualization.title: Data Visualization
visualization.description: Create interactive dashboards and visualizations that make complex data easy to understand.

cloud.title: Cloud Data Solutions
cloud.description: Build and deploy data solutions on cloud platforms like AWS and Azure for scalability and reliability.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm currently available for freelance work. If you're looking for a data engineer or analyst that likes to get stuff done, let's talk.

timezone.question: What time zone are you in?
timezone.answer: I'm currently living in France, in the Ile-de-France region. France is in the Central European Time (CET) time zone, which is one hour ahead of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC+1).

pricing.question: How much do you charge for a data project?
pricing.answer: There is no fixed cost for a data project. The cost varies depending on several factors like: complexity of the data pipeline, data volume, timeframe, customization, functionality, maintenance and support, and the list can get long. So, if you have a project idea, just get in touch with me so that we can discuss and agree on a price.

hourly.question: Do you charge by the hour?
hourly.answer: I do not charge by the hour. I prefer to eliminate the stress of counting the hours. Instead, I charge a flat fee per project, regardless of duration.

etl.title: ETL Pipeline for Sales Data
etl.description: Built a scalable ETL pipeline using Python and Apache Airflow to process and transform sales data from multiple sources into a data warehouse.

churn.title: Customer Churn Analysis
churn.description: Analyzed customer behavior patterns to predict churn using machine learning models, resulting in 15% reduction in customer attrition.

dashboard.title: Real-time Dashboard
dashboard.description: Created an interactive dashboard using Tableau to visualize real-time business metrics and KPIs for executive decision-making.
